item.title: US house passes bill to end historic government shutdown, sending measure to Trump
item.description: <p>The House passed a bill to end the US&#x27;s longest government shutdown, sending the measure to US President Donald Trump for his signature after a historic 43-day funding lapse.</p>

item.title: 'Cruel and inhumane': Reptile smuggler sentenced after hiding lizards in boots and socks
item.description: <p>A Chinese national who attempted to smuggle nearly 100 native Australian reptiles overseas has been sentenced in Sydney, with authorities warning that wildlife trafficking will &quot;not be tolerated.&quot; </p>

item.title: China hits back at Australia's spy chief over cyber espionage warning
item.description: <p>&quot;It&#x27;s hoped that the Australian official can stop making irresponsible statements.&quot;</p>

item.title: Neo-Nazi Thomas Sewell bailed after allegedly 'leading' group attack on sacred site
item.description: <p>Thomas Sewell, 32, hired a top barrister to argue he should be freed for a second time before Melbourne&#x27;s Supreme Court on Wednesday, after an unsuccessful attempt two months ago.</p>

item.title: Dodgy real estate agents to face $110,000 fines for misleading listing prices
item.description: <p>The proposed reforms are cracking down on misleading price listings.</p>

item.title: 'Bad reviews': Restaurant owners who ditched Menulog years ago say the writing was on the wall
item.description: <p>Users were surprised when Menulog went under. But the people at the other end weren&#x27;t.</p>

item.title: The US government has reopened after a historic shutdown. What does that mean, exactly?
item.description: <p>Thousands of federal workers went without pay, travellers were stranded at airports, and people lined up at food banks for almost eight weeks.</p>

item.title: Liberals officially abandon net zero after months of division
item.description: <p>Opposition Leader Sussan Ley has confirmed the Liberal Party will no longer﻿ support hitting net zero by 2050 following a five-hour party room meeting in Canberra yesterday.</p>

item.title: Police hunt creep who performed lewd act in woman's window
item.description: <p>The man was wearing a distinctive pink bucket hat, sunglasses and a Nike t-shirt at the time of the incident.</p>

item.title: Aussies are calling out tax dodgers in record numbers, ATO says
item.description: <p>The Australian Taxation Office has hit a major milestone, receiving over 300,000 tip-offs from the community about dodgy tax avoiders.</p>

item.title: 9News - Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world
item.description: Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world

item.title: Cost of treatment for deadly cancer slashed dramatically after PBS addition
item.description: <p>Those with multiple myeloma, an incurable blood cancer, would previously pay up to $150,000 for treatment.</p>

item.title: Sydney Trains frontline employee stood down after attending neo-Nazi rally outside Parliament House
item.description: <p>Transport for NSW has stood down a frontline employee after he attended a roughly 60-member strong neo-Nazi rally outside Parliament House. </p>

item.title: Fortune teller and daughter accused of $70 million fraud, alleged to have connections to one of Australia's la
item.description: <p>Anya Phan allegedly persuaded victims to take out loans based on her prediction of a billionaire figure in their future.</p>

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings
